body.name: Flash Furniture Gael 6' Wood Folding Training and Event Table, Rectangular Folding Training Table with Smooth Clear Coated Finished Top, Natural
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.

features: 6' RECTANGULAR TRAINING TABLE: Provides functional space for training rooms or classrooms and comfortably seats up to 3 people on one side while allowing each person a clear view of the board and instructor

VERSATILE USES: Set up your products at convention centers, host a sip and paint party with friends, or use it to hand out travel brochures, information pamphlets, or test packets for students or trainees
DURABLE CONSTRUCTION: 0.75" thick plywood top with durable black T-mold edge band and powder-coated locking legs withstand years of quality use and is easy to clean

FOLDABLE LEG DESIGN: Allows for easy transportation and compact storage, and the legs feature non-marring floor caps on the bottom that prevent your flooring surfaces from being damaged when moving the table
NO ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Measures 18"W x 72"D x 30.25"H for the perfect size to accommodate all your information papers, supplies, food and drinks, and more, and no assembly is required
body.description: Whether you're onboarding new employees or conducting the monthly safety training, attendees will need a workspace. This 6' rectangular wood folding table can be paired with others and set up in rows, classroom style, or in a "U" formation for a conference room look. This seminar table is beneficial in a multitude of settings that include banquet facilities, conference centers and schools. Use in the home for extra dining space, holding your sewing machine or in the laundry room for folding clothes or storing your cleaning supplies. If you don't have a lot of space for a permanent setup, the legs fold under the table to make storage more convenient and for better portability. The included floor caps protect your flooring. This table is commercial grade to withstand everyday use in the hospitality industry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Pleasantly surprised great quality sturdy and strong! Heavy would not recommend for pop up events but would recommend for home use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an excellent product
reviews.reviewText: I bought 2 of these for my study so that I could make my own larger-than-normal L-shaped desk, and I couldn't be happier with the purchase; 18x72 is exactly the size I need, and it's nearly impossible to find desks for sale in that size (L-shaped or otherwise). The 2 tables together cost me just over $100 with my Amazon Prime free shipping (whereas I was looking at closer to $900 for retail+shipping on 2 fancier, non-folding 18x72 training tables sold by those office furniture type companies which were the only other 18x72 tables I could find; the shipping alone on even folding versions of 18x72 tables was nearly $200, double the entire cost of my order- with the free shipping- via Amazon Prime). These tables are excellent - they are a perfect size for my needs, they are sturdy (even in my carpeted room), the color is beautifully warm, and the varnish is beautifully shiny- the only minus is it took a couple of days to air out the strong varnish smell (I aired it out with an open window and plates of baking soda). I highly recommend these tables (and if you are looking for a very spacious, very affordable desk option, I would strongly recommend making an L-shaped desk by buying two of these -- or even, as I ultimately went with, a U-shaped desk using these 2 tables as '90° side extensions' on either side of a current desk).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Perfect model building table for my son's room, not taking up much space.The cardboard box it came in was damaged and had holes in several places and the table surface was scratchedprobably forn SHIPPER. Kept it anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I bought this table not knowing exactly what to expect. But I am really surprised. This table looks Fantastic. Its length, sturdiness, and look of the Wood. Very easy setup: Just unfold the legs and its done. My only drawback is that there are no screws, bolts or locks under the table to lock the legs into place. Overall I'm giving it a 4/5 Stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works but was damaged
reviews.reviewText: Box was damaged and there was chips on the corners. Decided not to return because it would have been too much of a hassle. It works for what we wanted it for but sad that it was damaged when it arrived.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this table to put in my exercise room to hold a couple of monitors, Apple TVs, and other things to keep handy as part of a 2-bike Rouvy setup. It's one solid table and is working perfectly for me. It is heavy - I wouldn't want to be folding it up and moving it often.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Product/ Poor Packaging
reviews.reviewText: Very nice table. It is sturdy and and a good value. As others have written the packaging is horrible. The box is flimsy, there was no padding and as a result it arrived torn in several places. It’s very heavy so I’m sure it was shoved and dragged across the floor and or ground. Unfortunately, the poor packaging resulted in damage. There is a about a 1.5 inch gouge on the table top. In normal times I would have returned it, but with COVID19 I was honestly lucky to have it delivered. I did not feel like waiting a month for a new table. The blemish is hidden under my laptop so I’m not bothered. It’s serving well as a desk. It’s holding my laptop, two monitors, a lamp, and desk supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very well made.
reviews.reviewText: The table is very well made and sturdy. I originally ordered 6 for work and the boss was very pleased and had me order 4 more after seeing them in our conference room. Now he wants me to order more for other areas of the business.
